hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const cmd=i.tool_input?.command||'';if(process.platform!=='win32'&&!process.env.TMUX&&/(npm (install|test|run build|run dev)|pnpm( run)? (install|test|build|dev)|yarn (install|test|build|dev)|bun (install|test|run dev|run build)|cargo (build|test)|make\b|docker\b|pytest\b|vitest\b|playwright\b)/.test(cmd)){console.error('[Hook] Consider running in tmux for session persistence.');console.error('[Hook] Start: tmux new -s dev');console.error('[Hook] Reattach: tmux attach -t dev')}}catch{}console.log(d)})"

PreToolUse.description: Reminder to use tmux for long-running commands (warn only)
